SPELLBOOK.Preparation.AtWillTooltip: This spell can be cast at will and doesn't require preparation

SPELLBOOK.Search.AdvancedSyntaxSupport: Search spells with advanced syntax support
Single character to trigger advanced search mode. Must not be a letter or number. Common symbols: ^ ! @ # $ % & * + = ? ~ | \ / < >
SPELLBOOK.Settings.AutoDeleteUnpreparedS: When enabled, automatically removes unprepared prepared-casting spells from character sheets after saving. This cleans up spells that were manually unprepared through the system UI.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CPRCompatibility.Hint: When enabled, automatically runs CPR automation setup after spells are added to character sheets.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CPRCompatibility.Name: Cauldron of Plentiful Resources Compatibility
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CantripPreparationBon: Bonus to the number of cantrips this class can prepare. Can be negative to reduce the base amount.
Cannot reduce {class} cantrip preparation below {total} total cantrips
Cannot reduce cantrip preparation bonus further
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CantripScaleValues.Hi: Comma-separated list of scale value keys to check for cantrip limits. The system will use the first matching key found. Add custom keys for homebrew classes as needed. WARNING: syntax errors may break this module, follow identifer rules.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CantripSwapping.Hint: When this class can swap cantrips
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CantripSwapping.Label: Cantrip Swapping
SPELLBOOK.Settings.ClassRules.Descriptio: Configure spellcasting rules for each class individually.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.ClassRules.Title: Per-Class Rules
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CompendiumSelectionHi: Select which compendiums to include in spell indexing for better performance
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CompendiumSelectionIn: Select which compendiums should be indexed for spell searching. Reducing the number of indexed compendiums will improve performance, especially with large compendium collections. Note: If you do not select any spell compendiums, this module will not function correctly.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CompendiumSelectionPe: Changes take effect after reload. Large collections will take time to index.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.ConsumeScrollsWhenLea: Whether spell scrolls should be consumed when learning spells from them in the wizard Spell Book.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CustomSpellList.Hint: Use a custom spell list instead of the default class list
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CustomSpellList.Label: Custom Spell List
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CustomSpellLists.Hint: Select additional spell lists to merge with the base class list. Multiple selections will be combined automatically.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.CustomSpellMappings.H: Mappings between original and custom spell lists
SPELLBOOK.Settings.DefaultEnforcementBeh: How spell selection rules should be enforced by default
Display spell components (V, S, M, etc.)
Control what metadata is displayed across the module.
Customize which UI elements and metadata are displayed in spell lists
SPELLBOOK.Settings.DisableLongRestSwapPr: Disable the dialog prompt that appears after a long rest when characters can swap spells or cantrips. The Spell Book will still be available for swapping.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.DisabledNoScaleValue: Disabled because no cantrip scale value was found for this class.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.EnableJournalButton.H: Adds Spell List Manager & Stats buttons to the journal directory sidebar
SPELLBOOK.Settings.EnableJournalButton.N: Show Spell List Manager & Spell Analytics
SPELLBOOK.Settings.EnableSpellUsageTrack: Track spell usage for analytics. Disable this during mock sessions or combat tests.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.EnforcementBehavior.H: How strictly to enforce spellcasting rules
SPELLBOOK.Settings.FilterConfiguration.H: Configure which filters are enabled and their display order
SPELLBOOK.Settings.FilterInstructions: Enable or disable filters using checkboxes. Drag filters with grip handles to reorder them. Some filters have fixed positions and cannot be moved.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.FixedPositionDesc: This filter has a fixed position
SPELLBOOK.Settings.ForceWizardMode.Hint: Treat this class as a wizard, enabling wizard Spell Book functionality including spell copying, ritual casting from Spell Book, and Spell Book management. This creates a separate wizard Spell Book for this class.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.ForceWizardMode.Label: Force Wizard Mode
SPELLBOOK.Settings.HiddenSpellLists.Hint: Spell lists that have been hidden from view to reduce clutter.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.HiddenSpellLists.Name: Hidden Spell Lists
SPELLBOOK.Settings.IndexedCompendiumsHin: Configure which compendiums are indexed for spell searching to improve performance.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.InjectNotesIntoDescri: Automatically inject your personal spell notes into the descriptions of spells on your character sheet.

SPELLBOOK.Settings.Logger.Name: Logging Level
SPELLBOOK.Settings.NoScaleValueNotice: No cantrip scale value found, cantrips disabled for this class.

SPELLBOOK.Settings.SuppressMigrationWarn: Migration warnings suppressed. You will no longer receive migration notification messages.
When enabled, migration warnings will not be shown in chat after the initial setup. Enable this if migrations are running repeatedly and you don't need the notifications.

SPELLBOOK.Settings.Troubleshooter.Menu.H: Generate a troubleshooter report to assist with issues.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.Troubleshooter.Notes: The troubleshooter contains all relevant information needed to start the bug-squashing process. Using the buttons below, you can save this output as a file or copy it to your clipboard. Feel free to join the Discord or create an issue on Github.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.Troubleshooter.Reload: Many settings were imported. A reload is recommended for all changes to take effect.
SPELLBOOK.Settings.Troubleshooter.Title: Troubleshooter
SPELLBOOK.SpellListChange.Completed: Unprepared {total} spells due to spell list change
SPELLBOOK.SpellListChange.Confirmation: Do you want to proceed with this change?

SPELLBOOK.SpellListChange.Title: Confirm Spell List Change
SPELLBOOK.SpellSource.GrantedTooltip: This spell is granted by a feature or item and cannot be unprepared
SPELLBOOK.Spells.LockedNoSwapping: This spell cannot be unlearned once prepared
SPELLBOOK.Spells.LockedOutsideLevelUp: This spell can only be swapped during level up
SPELLBOOK.Spells.LockedOutsideLongRest: This spell can only be swapped during a long rest
SPELLBOOK.UI.NotesPlaceholder: Add your personal notes about this spell...
SPELLBOOK.UI.ResetTooltip: Reset (Shift+Click to clear all prepared spells)
SPELLBOOK.UserData.AnalyticsDescription: View detailed statistics and patterns in your spell usage, opened via individual Spell Books or from the Journals tab
SPELLBOOK.UserData.AutoGenerated: This data is automatically generated and managed by the Spell Book module.
SPELLBOOK.UserData.FavoriteDescription: Mark spells as favorites for quick access
SPELLBOOK.UserData.IntroDescription: This journal tracks your spell usage, favorites, and notes. Data is automatically collected as you cast spells and can be viewed in the analytics dashboard.
SPELLBOOK.UserData.NotesDescription: Personal notes that apply to this spell across all your characters:
SPELLBOOK.UserData.PageDescription: This page tracks your personal spell notes, favorites, and usage statistics. Data is automatically updated by the Spell Book module.
SPELLBOOK.UserData.UsageDescription: Automatic tracking of spell usage in combat and exploration
SPELLBOOK.Wizard.LearnSpellPromptSuffix: and add it to your Spell Book?
SPELLBOOK.Wizard.LegacyCantripRules: Legacy Rules: Cantrips cannot be changed during a long rest.
SPELLBOOK.Wizard.ModernCantripRules: Modern Rules: You may swap one cantrip during a long rest.
SPELLBOOK.Wizard.NewSpellsInfo1: When you find a wizard spell of 1st level or higher, you can add it to your Spell Book if it is of a level for which you have spell slots and if you can spare the time to decipher and copy it.
SPELLBOOK.Wizard.NewSpellsInfo2: For each level of the spell, the process takes 2 hours and costs 50 gp. The cost represents material components you expend as you experiment with the spell to master it, as well as the fine inks you need to record it.
SPELLBOOK.Wizard.SpellAlreadyKnown: This spell is already in your Spell Book.
SPELLBOOK.Wizard.Unavailable: The Wizard Spell Book is only available for characters with the Wizard class.
SPELLMANAGER.Application.Title: Spell List Manager
SPELLMANAGER.Columns.AddSpellsPrompt: Select spells from the right panel to add them to this list.
SPELLMANAGER.Columns.EditPrompt: Select a spell list and click "Edit" to customize it.
SPELLMANAGER.Columns.NoListSelected: Select a spell list from the left column to view its contents.
SPELLMANAGER.Columns.NoSpells: This spell list contains no spells.
SPELLMANAGER.Confirm.Content: Are you sure you want to proceed?
SPELLMANAGER.Confirm.DeleteContent: Are you sure you want to delete the custom version of {name}? This cannot be undone.
SPELLMANAGER.Confirm.RestoreContent: Are you sure you want to restore {name} from the original source? Your customizations will be lost.
SPELLMANAGER.Confirm.Title: Confirm Action
SPELLMANAGER.CreateList.IdentifierNotes: An identifier can only contain lowercase letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), dashes (-), and underscores (_).
SPELLMANAGER.CreateList.MergedDescriptio: Merged spell list combining spells from {sourceList} and {copyFromList}
SPELLMANAGER.CreateList.SubclassHint: Mark this spell list as a subclass-specific spell list
SPELLMANAGER.CreateList.ValidationError: Invalid identifier format. Please use only lowercase letters, numbers, dashes, and underscores.
SPELLMANAGER.Documentation.Creation.Cont: Select a spell list from the left column. Click the "Edit" button to create a custom copy. Add or remove spells using the right panel. Click "Save" when you're done.
SPELLMANAGER.Documentation.Creation.Step: Select a spell list from the left column.
Click the "Edit" button to create a custom copy.
Add or remove spells using the right panel.
SPELLMANAGER.Documentation.Integration.C: When a player opens their Spell Book, the system will check if a custom version of their class spell list exists, use your custom version if available, or fall back to the original list if no custom version exists.
SPELLMANAGER.Documentation.Modifying.Con: Custom lists will show additional controls:
Delete Custom Version: Remove your custom version.
Restore from Source: Reset the list to match the original.
SPELLMANAGER.Documentation.Modifying.Not: If the original list has been updated since your customization, you'll see a notification.
SPELLMANAGER.Documentation.Overview.Cont: The Spell List Manager allows you to browse, duplicate, and customize spell lists from compendiums. These customized lists can then be used by players in their Spell Book.
SPELLMANAGER.Documentation.Practices.Ite: Create custom lists before your players create characters.
Test custom lists with dummy characters before using them in your game.
Keep a backup of important custom lists by exporting them.
Consider communicating list changes to players before making major modifications.
SPELLMANAGER.Documentation.Title: Spell List Manager Documentation
SPELLMANAGER.Footer.HiddenCountTooltip: Number of spell lists hidden from view
SPELLMANAGER.Footer.SpellCountTooltip: Number of spells in the currently selected spell list
SPELLMANAGER.Footer.SpellSourcesTooltip: Source compendiums containing spells in this list
SPELLMANAGER.Footer.TotalListsTooltip: Number of visible spell lists (excludes hidden lists)
SPELLMANAGER.Footer.TotalSpellsTooltip: Total number of spells available across all compendiums
SPELLMANAGER.HideList.HideTooltip: Hide this spell list from view
SPELLMANAGER.HideList.UnhideTooltip: Restore this spell list to its original folder
SPELLMANAGER.MergeLists.ErrorMessage: Failed to create merged spell list

SPELLMANAGER.MergeLists.InsufficientList: At least two spell lists are required for merging
SPELLMANAGER.MergeLists.MergedListNameNo: If left blank, will be named '{Source List Name} (Merged)'
SPELLMANAGER.MergeLists.SameListError: Source list and copy-from list cannot be the same
SPELLMANAGER.Rename.DuplicateNameError: A spell list with this name already exists.
SPELLMANAGER.Rename.Title: Rename '{currentName}'
SPELLMANAGER.Tooltips.CustomList: Spell List for a {type} with the '{identifier}' identifier
SPELLMANAGER.Tooltips.CustomListsFolder: A collection of spell lists manually created using the Spell List Manager
SPELLMANAGER.Tooltips.HiddenList: This spell list is hidden from player view
SPELLMANAGER.Tooltips.HiddenListsFolder: A collection of spell lists that have been hidden to reduce clutter
SPELLMANAGER.Tooltips.MergeLists: Merge two spell lists into a new custom list
